title: Flight to Tokyo
helpfulInfo: Use Narita Express (included in JR Pass) to reach Shinjuku in ~75 min; stroll Omoide Yokocho for yakitori this evening.

title: Tokyo
helpfulInfo: Arrive at Senso‑ji by 08:00 to beat crowds, then ride the Sumida River ferry to Hama‑Rikyu Gardens.

title: Tokyo → Hakone
highlights: Hakone Tozan Railway – https://www.hakone-tozan.co.jp/en/ ; Onsen Infos – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e5200.html
helpfulInfo: Reserve the Hakone Freepass online; store bags in lockers at Hakone‑Yumoto before boarding the scenic railway.

title: Hakone
helpfulInfo: Sit on the right‑hand side of the ropeway for the best Mount Fuji views and try black eggs at Ōwakudani.

title: Hakone → Kyoto
helpfulInfo: Ship big luggage ahead (¥2 200/bag) so you travel light; seats D/E on the Shinkansen have Fuji views until Shizuoka.

title: Kyoto
highlights: Higashiyama – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3918.html ; Gion (Geisha) – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3909.html ; Teezeremonie – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2095.html
helpfulInfo: Start at Kiyomizu‑dera 06:00 to enjoy an empty veranda; book a 45‑minute Gion tea ceremony online for the afternoon.

title: Kyoto
highlights: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3912.html ; Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion) – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3908.html
helpfulInfo: Reach Arashiyama Bamboo Grove by 07:00 for photos; buy a combined Tenryū‑ji garden ticket (¥800) at the north gate.

title: Kyoto
helpfulInfo: Todaiji opens 08:00—feed the deer at dawn first; back in Kyoto walk the Philosopher’s Path at sunset.

title: Kyoto → Hiroshima
helpfulInfo: Store luggage in Hiroshima Station lockers (¥700); visit the Peace Museum at 08:30 to avoid the 11‑14h peak.

title: Hiroshima
helpfulInfo: Check tide tables—Miyajima’s torii ‘floats’ two hours around high tide; JR ferry every 15 min, covered by pass.

title: Hiroshima → Kanazawa
helpfulInfo: Kenroku‑en is free before 07:00; combine with Kanazawa Castle via the Ishikawa Gate; buy a Loop‑Bus day pass (¥600).

title: Kanazawa
helpfulInfo: In Nagamachi samurai district visit Nomura‑ke with English audio; try gold‑leaf ice cream in Higashi‑Chaya.

title: Kanazawa → Tokyo
helpfulInfo: Reserve a window seat on the Kagayaki Shinkansen for Sea‑of‑Japan views the first 30 min; send bags to airport hotel.

title: Tokyo
highlights: Meiji-Schrein – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3002.html ; Harajuku – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3006.html ; Shibuya – https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e3007.html
helpfulInfo: Meiji Shrine opens at dawn; after Harajuku crepes, pre‑book Shibuya Sky sunset slot online.

title: Tokyo → Kanagawa
helpfulInfo: Pay ¥50 to walk inside Kamakura’s Great Buddha; ride Yokohama’s Cosmo Clock 17 after dark for skyline photos.

title: Yokohama
helpfulInfo: Book a private tea room in Sankeien Garden (¥3 000/hr) and a sunset cruise from Osanbashi pier (1 hr).

title: Yokohama → Tokyo
helpfulInfo: Use the Metro 24‑h ticket (¥600) for unlimited rides; consider teamLab Borderless in Azabudai Hills (opened 2024).

title: Flight to Hawaii
helpfulInfo: Check‑in opens three hours before departure; airport Muji is great for last‑minute gifts.
